amendment.description: To establish safety standards for certain limousines.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2570 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 58 - 39. Record Vote Number: 307.

action.text: Amendment SA 2570 proposed by Senator Carper for Senator Schumer to Amendment SA 2137. (consideration: CR S5819-5820, S5820-5821; text: CR S5819-5820) To establish safety standards for certain limousines.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2570 proposed by Senator Carper for Senator Schumer to Amendment SA 2137.
